tool_description: A financial calculator for mortgage repayments, investments, retirement and more
name: Financial Calculator
title: Financial Calculator

api_list.name: investment
api_list.description: Returns the end value of an investment

required_parameters.name: compoundingPeriod
required_parameters.description:
How often the investment compounds.
Must be an enum of Year, Month, Week, or Day.

required_parameters.name: years
required_parameters.description: The number of years to calculate the return for the investment.

required_parameters.name: startingValue
required_parameters.description: The starting value of the investment.

required_parameters.name: yearlyYield
required_parameters.description: The annual yield in % of the investment.

optional_parameters.name: ordinary
optional_parameters.description:
Whether the extra payment is ordinary (paid at the end of the payment period) or not (paid at the beginning of the period).
Defaults to true.

optional_parameters.name: extraPayment
optional_parameters.description:
Recurring additional payments into the investment, or withdrawals if negative.
extraPaymentPeriod must be set if this value is used.

optional_parameters.name: extraPaymentPeriod
optional_parameters.description:
If an extra payment is defined, this is the frequency of the extra payment.
Must be an enum of Year, Month, Week, or Day.

api_list.name: retirement
api_list.description: An early retirement calculator that returns the number of years to retirement given investment and spending information.

optional_parameters.name: withdrawalRate
optional_parameters.description:
The withdrawal rate from the investment portfolio after retirement.
Defaults to 4%

optional_parameters.name: returnRate
optional_parameters.description:
The % yield on the investment portfolio.
Defaults to 5%

optional_parameters.name: currentPortfolioValue
optional_parameters.description:
The current value of the investment portfolio.
Defaults to 0.

api_list.name: mortgage

required_parameters.name: homePrice
required_parameters.description: The price of the home for the mortgage.

required_parameters.name: loanYears
required_parameters.description: The number of years for the mortgage.

required_parameters.name: downPayment
required_parameters.description: The value of the initial deposit.

api_list.name: interest
api_list.description: Returns interest rate and payment totals from loan payment information

required_parameters.name: payment
required_parameters.description: The monthly payment on the loan.

required_parameters.name: principal
required_parameters.description: The principal value of the loan.

required_parameters.name: months
required_parameters.description: The number of months before the loan is fully paid.

api_list.name: amortization
api_list.description: Returns an amortization schedule for a given loan

required_parameters.name: interestRate
required_parameters.description: The interest rate in % of the loan.

required_parameters.name: principal
required_parameters.description: The principal value of the loan.

required_parameters.name: totalPayments
required_parameters.description: The total number of payments to be made.
